result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.

result.orig: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh

result.eng: I pity the poor woman who died.

result.eng: Do you know my wife?

result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agat ar mo ḃeanDo you know my wife?

result.eng: My wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ga: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.orig: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo

result.ponchtml: Tá mo ḃean ag coinneáil go maiṫ an baḃta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann

result.eng: It is a temporary position, but my wife is a nurse and that is a permanent position.

result.eng: That woman is his mother.

result.eng: His wife is expecting a child in a couple of months.

result.ponchtml: Gortaíoḋ a ḃeanHis wife was injured.

result.eng: Myself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.

result.eng: I live in a detached house with my wife and my children.

result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach scoite le mo bhean agus mo chlann

result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.eng: Three women were wading through the snow.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: The old barracks are in public ownership now.
result.ga: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anois
result.orig: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anois
result.html: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anoisThe old barracks are in public ownership now.
result.ponchtml: I seilḃ an ṗobail atá an tseanḃeairic anoisThe old barracks are in public ownership now.

result.eng: There is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.
result.ga: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair Bhoston
result.orig: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair Bhoston
result.html: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair BhostonThere is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanreilig i lár ċaṫair ḂostonThere is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.

result.eng: I've known her long time.
result.ga: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthi
result.orig: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthi
result.html: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthiI've known her long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanaiṫne agamsa uirṫiI've known her long time.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ga: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.orig: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.html: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duitse aċ an tseanlánúin a ḃeiṫ sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.

result.eng: She is an old woman now.
result.ga: Is seanbhean anois í
result.orig: Is seanbhean anois í
result.html: Is seanbhean anois íShe is an old woman now.
result.ponchtml: Is seanḃean anois íShe is an old woman now.

result.eng: The old woman was a damn good story-teller.
result.ga: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbhean
result.orig: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbhean
result.html: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbheanThe old woman was a damn good story-teller.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá amaċ an scéalaí an tseanḃeanThe old woman was a damn good story-teller.
